pages.text: I'm coughing up ink. Not like before. $(o)Black$() goo. But I made it.$(br2)This place is not at all as I planned. I must have done something horribly wrong. I could feel my experience failing moments before I saw the opening begin to form. At first I thought I had gone blind, but it's just the inky black void of this failed world. No life. No movement.

There's fruit! Something went right! I've eaten so much of it, but it I think I'm having brief lapses in memory. I'm still ill. I'm still weak.$(br2)I'm coughing up more ink, and it's turning the floor it touches into something weird...
Something alive! Big at that! They eat the fruit! I'm riding them across the depths with ease!

I found a dead whale.$(br2)I tried to work out how it flies and I realised the secret lies in the skin under its fins. I used the skin to make wings! They're not as good as the whales themselves. All the time I've been trapped here without a sign of a cure has made me desperate, and I tried propelling myself with fireworks $(n)which decidedly does not work$()... The wings still make it easier to glide and bounce between the island masses though.
